Partecipazione al collegio dei docenti o.content: The University Italian system is collapsed. In the last five years there were only few open positions. Considering the absence of founding also teaching has been reduced, really rarely within schools of doctorate. During my Ph.D., I gave some lectures at the School of Humanites in Genoa. After my Ph.D., as Adjunct Professor at the Catholic University I did frequently meetings with the responsible for the International Curriculum and professors of other teachings, and as well as Researcher at Campostrini Foundation in Verona, in the way to plan lectures, seminars and conferences.

Specifiche esperienze professionali cara.content: I am Executive Director of the new ESMP and Editor-in-Chief of the official publication of the Society, Philosophical News, new series for Mimesis International entirely in English for both electronic and paper versions. I have also recently gave public contributions in ethics and moral philosophy, collaborating with media and several national and international journals. I participated to many research groups in moral philosophy, and I have intensively worked on many topics in moral philosophy. For further details and my publications, please see my curriculum vitae attached.

Direzione o partecipazione alle attivit\.content: Executive Director of the European Society for Moral Philosophy. The ESMP has be launched in May 2016 by me after a long networking. Many Universities, and Institution accepted to collaborate as: the Centre for Ethics della University of Toronto, the Center for Ethics and Culture della University of Notre Dame, the Center for Ethics in the Society della Stanford University, the Center for Law, Philosophy & Human Values, University of Chicago, the Centre for Ethics, Philosophy and Public Affairs della University of St Andrews, the Centre for Ethics and Poverty Research della Universität Salzburg, the Center for European Renewal ad Amsterdam, the Jubilee Centre for Character and Virtues della University of Birmingham, the 3TU, Centre for Ethics and Technology, the Center of Ethics Research Dr. Ricardo Maliandi in Argentina, the Center for Applied Ethics of the Hong Kong Baptist University and the Centre for Applied Ethics della University of Stellenbosch in South Africa. The ESMP received the patronage also from the European Cultural Parliament. President of Philosophical News Cultural Association. From 2012/2013: Project manager of the new platform for academic interconnection Philojotter.com. Member of the Italian Association for Philosophy of Religion; Member of the Editorial Board “Giornale di Filosofia della Religione”. Member of the American Philosophical Association. Member of Italian Society of Kantian Studies. Member of Italian Society for Analytic Philosophy. During the Ph.D.: research group in Ethics, proff. Campodonico and Letterio, University of Genoa; paticipation to the activities of the research group with prof. A.Muller, University of Chicago; research group in Ethics, Catholic University of Sacred Heart, Milan, with prof. F. Botturi and G. De Anna; collaboration to the Radical Orthodoxy with J. Milbank (talks presented at the conferences in Rome, Krakow, and Oxford). After the Ph.D.: active collaboration with prof. R. Brague, following lectures for Etienne Gilson chair, Institut Catholique de Paris; and prof. R. Pouivet.

Responsabilita' scientifica per progetti.content: PRIN 2010, Italian Project of National Interest, Università degli Studi di Genova. ESMP. Expected participation to next grants, e.g. Horizon 2020, Templeton Foundation or similar.
